EmailTemplate.name: 202003_Americas_GDT_Buy-More_HAT_Email.Email 2 HAT Open 24-7
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Aerospace Trading Remains Open Online, 24/7 When You Need Us
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Companies and people from around the world are doing everything they can to ensure the safety and health of the community. GoDirect Trade might just be a marketplace for aerospace parts, but our goal is to ensure that the aviation industry—especially during this challenging time cargo and healthcare-related aircraft—continues flying.
Honeywell Aerospace Trading <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/marketplace/seller/profile/shop/HoneywellAerospaceTrading/]]> is open online 24 hours a day, 7 days a week on GoDirect Trade. Over two billion dollars’ worth of inventory is available on the shelf and ready to ship.
We know flight hours for many are down in the short term but for the aircraft still in flight, GoDirect Trade and its Seller community are going to do everything we can to keep our customers flying. SHOP NOW <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/?utm_source=email&&utm_medium=email&&utm_campaign=Buy_More]]> Stay healthy, stay safe, and take care,
Lisa Butters GoDirect Trade, General Manager Powered by Honeywell
